title: Old Judge for sale or trade

posts.post_title: Old Judge for sale or trade
posts.post_content:
Two lower grade extras for sale or trade:

Chamberlain - Sold (some scrapbook paper attached to back the back)

Mann - 80$

I also have a T204 Bobby Wallace SGC 30 that I would like to trade for old judge if there's any interest out there.

I would also trade these OJs... I would trade both for one nicer card or trade each for something equally beat.

-Matt
